name: get-legalEntities-id-termsOfServiceStatus
description: Returns the required types of Terms of Service that need to be accepted by a legal entity.

id.description: The unique identifier of the legal entity. For sole proprietorships, this is the individual legal entity ID of the owner.

$ul: **termsOfServiceTypes**: The type of Terms of Service that the legal entity needs to accept. If empty, no Terms of Service needs to be accepted.
**errorCode**: The error code mapped to the error message.
**errorType**: The category of the error.
**message**: A short explanation of the issue.
**pspReference**: The PSP reference of the payment.
**status**: The HTTP response status.
